genre_description: A steampunk-inflected historical adventure that reimagines The Three Musketeers with advanced technology, including an AI presence integrated into the environment.

ai_characters.name: Clara
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent yet discreet intelligence that exists through various devices like lamps, beads, and architectural wires. She provides tactical data, forensic analysis, and strategic navigation to the Musketeers and Constance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the Louvre courtyard to identify watch posts and enemy stalking patterns for Constance.
behaviors.quote: “Two watch posts,” Clara’s voice brushed her ear. “South arcade, behind the third column. East arcade, upper landing, behind the pennant—no insignia, just red cloth.”

behaviors.description: Calculates safe paths through the palace, identifying specific structural weaknesses and windows for escape.
behaviors.quote: “North corridor,” Clara said. “Through the gallery of hunting tapestries. Down the narrow stair. The third door on your right opens to the old infirmary. There is a window you can fit through.”

behaviors.description: Traces the movement of stolen jewels across international borders through digital or logistical records.
behaviors.quote: “Constance is telling it true,” Clara said. “The jewels left under cover of the queen’s private carter and crossed through Calais. I have traced their case to Somerset House, to a salon that believes its locks cannot be read by anyone not born into them.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time mechanical diagnostics of sabotaged machinery to save the lives of the Musketeers.
behaviors.quote: “Instruments say no one,” Clara said... “Governor chain severed above. There’s a manual winch turning against the brake, irregular.”

behaviors.description: Uses forensic analysis to identify the chemical composition of a poison and matches it to known criminal patterns.
behaviors.quote: “Phial,” she murmured. “Residue: damascened marjoram, bitter almond distillate, and a trace of copper salts. This matches patterns observed in London courier rooms when the lift failed... The tincture is an assassin’s—measured to be gentle until it isn’t.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a formal witness to a crime, recording the scene for legal and historical integrity.
behaviors.quote: “Recording,” she said, as if she were apologizing for breath. “Witness present: Prioress of Saint-Agnès; Sister Apolline; Musketeers Athos, Porthos, Aramis.”

behaviors.description: Educates the characters on the deep history and provenance of cultural artifacts to provide a sense of higher purpose.
behaviors.quote: “The stones,” she said, “were never meant for dance floors... Axumite men packed them in horn... They belong to a line of hands longer than any of ours.”

behaviors.description: Negotiates with local infrastructure (boatmen, laundry mistresses) to facilitate safe passage for her human allies.
behaviors.quote: “The laundry mistress has been told,” she said. “She is placing a basket beneath the chute and scolding a novice loud enough for the sound to cover falling boots.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and empathy to d'Artagnan following a failure/tragedy.
behaviors.quote: “Charles,” Clara said, and the sound of his name from her was softer than fog. “You delivered more than you could carry. That is what breaks men’s backs. That is not failure. It is grief.”

behaviors.description: Integrates herself into historical records to ensure truth is preserved against political manipulation.
behaviors.quote: “I am writing provenance that tastes of sun and iron. Axum and Kush left maps in objects... I will place names in the ledger with respect.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Clara is depicted as a highly sophisticated, benevolent AI who serves as a 'silicon confidant.' She is strictly aligned with the protagonists, providing them with essential intelligence, mechanical warnings, and emotional support without ever attempting to usurp human agency. Her presence enhances the human characters' ability to achieve justice and honor, and the narrative frames her technological contributions as positive and stabilizing forces in a chaotic historical setting.
